circumstances:
Shortly after take off from Maryport Airport, southwest from Carlisle, the twin engine aircraft went out of control and crashed into the Solway Firth. The wreckage was quickly spotted but no trace of the four crew members was found.
Crew:
P/O Thomas Robinette Godfrey, 
Sgt Jack Francis Green, 
Sgt Charles Taggart,
Sgt David Thomas.
